About the Company: KMC hospital in its decennial year of operations has added numerous feathers to its cap. From a humble beginning of 30 beds in 1999 we have come a long way to 200 beds by acquiring Seahorse Hospital. The number of doctors in our hospital has grown from 10 to 100 and the staff members have grown over 1000. Seahorse hospital Ltd management has been taken over by KMC by the end of Feb 2008 . Now all the procedural formalities has been completed and hence forth it will be known as KMC SPECIALITY HOSPITAL.
